sentence.Network_en: Players use a haptic device such as a joystick to control the game.

entry.tran: （计算机游戏的）控制杆，游戏杆
entry.def: In some computer games, the joystick is the lever which the player uses in order to control the direction of the things on the screen.
In an aircraft, the joystick is the lever which the pilot uses to control the direction and height of the aeroplane.

means.word_mean: 1. a lever used by a pilot to control the ailerons and elevators of an airplane
2. a manual control consisting of a vertical handle that can move freely in two directions; used as an input device to computers or to devices controlled by computers
